name: Amunets Deco Collector - v0.1.16
description:
Mod-ID: 2365946321

A placeable that "collects" nearby decoration placeables and combines them into one.
Allow packing and unpacking of placeables on-the fly.

Improves server performance by reducing the number of individual placeable actors.
Improves client performance by using instanced static meshes for drawing.

To unpack all items, hold the Interact-Key (default E) on the 'ADC Placeable' object and select "unpack all".
To unpack indivudual items, holt the Interact-Key on the Object you want to unpack and choose "Interact".

This is supposed to work with any STATIC decoration item, however it uses a whitelist for now.

Does (currently) NOT support:
- skeletal meshes (like most flags)
- most stuff with specific interactions like doors, hatches, torches, instruments, traps etc.
- particles, lights etc.

Comes with prepared item lists for:
- Conan Exiles + DLCs
- Age of Calamitous
- Ancient Civilization
- Beyond Decor
- Deco and Placeables
- Desert Town
- Dudes Delightful Decorations
- Emberlight
- ExilesExtreme
- Fachwerk
- GCam
- NothernTimber
- SavageSteel I & II
- Shadows of Skelos Extended & II
- ThrallWars DungeonMod
- Warrior Mutator
- LdS-Modpack
- Terra Mystica Roleplay Mod
- The sapphire exile (LCDA map)

Discord @ https://discord.gg/a8hGAKW
Patreon @ https://www.patreon.com/sailorsat
